Class ClassicBattleMatchManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.classicBattle.ClassicBattleMatchManager
public class ClassicBattleMatchManager extends Object
Responsible for match lifecycle: watching for game-over, coordinating preview/audio stop, and invoking callbacks to show overlays or restart the match.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearMatchEnded()
    Clear the internal match-ended flag (used when the owner restarts a match).
    void
    registerListeners()
    Register listeners on both GUI controllers to detect game-over events.
    void
    restartMatch()
    Trigger a match restart by invoking the configured restart action and clearing the internal match-ended flag.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassicBattleMatchManager

      public ClassicBattleMatchManager(GuiController leftGui, GuiController rightGui, ClassicBattlePreviewService previewService, ClassicBattleAudioHelper audioHelper, Runnable stopMusicAction, Runnable restartAction, BiConsumer<String,String> showWinnerOverlay)

  • Method Details

    • registerListeners

      public void registerListeners()
      Register listeners on both GUI controllers to detect game-over events. When a game-over is observed the manager will coordinate stopping the preview, invoking audio hooks and showing the winner overlay via the provided showWinnerOverlay callback.

    • restartMatch

      public void restartMatch()
      Trigger a match restart by invoking the configured restart action and clearing the internal match-ended flag.

    • clearMatchEnded

      public void clearMatchEnded()
      Clear the internal match-ended flag (used when the owner restarts a match).
